backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing products with admin-gated CRUD, category queries, blob storage mixin, and Stripe session/config integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing files, components, and test IDs related to fixing the consultation flow errors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all major frontend components, pages, and utilities in the project.
frontend/deploy/nginx/site.conf: Nginx configuration for serving the SPA with caching, security headers, and SPA fallback routing.
Systemd service unit for running Nginx as a static server for the frontend with security hardening.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment guide outlining environment setup, build verification, critical checks, and required variables.
frontend/docker-compose.yml: Docker Compose setup building and running the frontend with environment variable injection and health checks.
frontend/Dockerfile: Multi‑stage Dockerfile building the Vite React frontend with pnpm and serving it via Nginx with runtime env injection.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up process.env shims and loading the React app with optional runtime env overrides.
frontend/LINUX_HOSTING.md: Guide for hosting the frontend on Linux using Docker, Docker Compose, or direct Nginx deployment.
frontend/nginx/default.conf: Nginx config for serving a Vite React SPA with caching rules, security headers, and SPA fallback.
frontend/offline-bundle/assets/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to retain the assets directory.
frontend/offline-bundle/css/styles.css: Contains styling for the offline site including layout, colors, typography, hero section, and responsive navigation.
frontend/offline-bundle/fonts/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to retain the fonts directory.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/hero-illu: SVG illustration used as the hero image with landscape and agricultural elements.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/journal-p: SVG placeholder graphic representing a journal cover.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/logo.svg: SVG logo graphic for the Agrigence offline site.
frontend/offline-bundle/index.html: Main HTML file for the offline site defining layout, sections, navigation, and content structure.
frontend/offline-bundle/js/app.js: JavaScript for menu toggling, smooth scrolling, form handling, and section highlighting.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.md: Explains how to use the offline website bundle by opening index.html locally.
frontend/project/admin.html: Admin dashboard UI containing user search, user details view, and restricted access gate.
frontend/project/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the assets directory in version control.
frontend/project/css/main.css: Main stylesheet defining layout, typography, components, and theme variables for the frontend.
frontend/project/dashboard.html: User dashboard page providing profile display and editing features.
frontend/project/index.html: Login and registration interface with forms for authentication and account creation.
frontend/project/js/admin.js: Admin panel logic for loading users, viewing details, updating submissions, and handling admin actions.
frontend/project/js/auth.js: Authentication module implementing login, registration, password management, and session handling.
frontend/project/js/dashboard.js: Controls the user dashboard, loading profile, payment, and submission data and managing UI interactions like editing and photo upload.
frontend/project/js/db.js: Implements a localStorage-backed mock database with seed users, payments, submissions, and initialization logic.
frontend/project/js/main.js: Initializes page-specific logic for login, registration, and navigation based on the current page.
frontend/project/README.md: Documentation for the offline journal portal mini-app describing features, flows, accounts, and usage.
frontend/project/receipts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the receipts directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React router, theme, identity provider, and page routes for the frontend application.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an alert informing the user they lack permission to access a page.
frontend/src/components/ArticleSubmissio: Shows the user's article submission plan details with loading, error, and active plan states.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Renders a live countdown timer to the monthly 25th deadline with days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social links, quick links, and resources sections.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main site header with navigation, user menu, authentication handling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/HomeHeroIllustra: Displays a hero background that uses a video with fallback to an image based on motion preferences and errors.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with header, marquee banner, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Shows an animated loading screen with determinate or indeterminate progress and fade-out transitions.
frontend/src/components/NoticeMarqueeBan: Renders a scrolling notices banner when enabled via backend configuration.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info with category labeling and a button linking to an external purchase page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for collecting and submitting user profile details with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Dialog component for configuring Stripe, handling secret key and country inputs with mutation and validation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: Simple visitor counter that increments and displays a value stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that detects user reduced‑motion preferences using a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks that wrap backend actor methods, mostly placeholders for profile, banner, news, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode theming, typography rules, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About and Contact page with mission info, founder sections, and a contact form with toast-based submission feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an About page component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelContent.tsx: Provides the admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with dialogs and category handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Wraps the admin panel with permission checks and displays loading, error, or access-denied states.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Implements article submission UI with authentication and eligibility checks but disables actual submission.
Displays detailed author guidelines, publication policies, and formatting requirements with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ConsultationPage.tsx: Provides a consultation request form and generates WhatsApp or email links after validating user input.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for a Contact page component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard showing profile info, subscription status, and submitted articles using various query hooks. Includes loading, error states, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Displays editorial board members with avatars, roles, and profile details using data from a query hook. Handles image URL resolution and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Shows a static page explaining that password reset is unsupported and provides support contact info. Offers navigation back to login or home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero section and multiple content feeds such as news, blogs, magazines, reviews, books, and products, using fallback samples when needed.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Displays the current journal issue and an archive filtered by year, with downloading support via blob URLs. Includes year selection and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen where email/password is disabled and only Internet Identity login is supported, including admin check and navigation after login.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays news and blog posts with tab switching, loading states, and formatted article cards.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message for unsuccessful payments with options to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe payment success by validating session status, creating subscriptions, and showing loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays books and agricultural products with loading, error handling, and product cards.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Renders a disabled signup form and alerts users that email/password registration is unavailable and Internet Identity must be used.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Lists subscription plans, handles Stripe checkout session creation, and manages admin Stripe setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: React page that fetches and displays Terms and Conditions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Adds browser-safe TypeScript declarations for process.env to prevent build errors.
frontend/src/utils/consultationValidatio: Provides validation utilities for consultation forms including email and required‑field checks.
frontend/src/utils/consultExpertMailto.t: Generates static or dynamic URL‑encoded mailto links for consultation requests.
frontend/src/utils/consultWhatsAppLink.t: Builds a WhatsApp wa.me URL with encoded consultation details.
frontend/src/utils/homePageSamples.ts: Defines sample placeholder data for news, blogs, and other homepage sections.
frontend/src/utils/optimizeImage.ts: Performs client‑side image resizing/compression and provides a fallback if optimization fails.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Utilities for updating document title and meta description for SEO.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including a fix request for a consultation flow error and a pending regression-check feature.
